General.Name: Yueyang Forest & Paper Co Ltd
General.Description: Yueyang Forest & Paper Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cultural, industrial, and packaging paper products. The company provides offset printing papers, copy papers, refined lightweight coated papers, copy papers, pure wood pulp papers, and light offset papers, as well as kraft paper, stretchable bag paper, paper bag paper, handbag paper, food packaging paper, coated paper, composite base paper, wet curtain paper, etc. It serves publishers, magazines, large printing plants, paper products processing companies, paper products distributors, etc. The company also exports its products. Yueyang Forest & Paper Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Yueyang, the People's Republic of China.
